ygData.subject: RE: Adventure vacation in Kithicor
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Yes, there seems to be a random component too.  Sometimes the merchant by the Kelethin bank gives me the best prices if I use the Charisma song, other
ygData.messageBody:
On Tue, 13 Jul 1999, Kimes, Dean W. wrote:
>
> >Some merchants are just stingier than others and do not seem
> >to give you the best prices despite your faction. Others will
> >give you the best prices even if they are indifferent to you
> >(if you have sufficient charisma).
>
> That's part of the weird part, Twippie definitely usually gives me the best
> price, but occasionally he gives me bad prices, then next time I zone in the
> prices are back to best again, all with no faction change.

Yes, there seems to be a random component too. Sometimes the
merchant by the Kelethin bank gives me the best prices if I
use the Charisma song, other times I have to trek over to the
Ranger's guild.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
